name: SumFlowSensor
comment: Temperature measured on VF1

name: OutsideTemp
comment: Outside temperature

name: FlowTempDesired
comment: Flow temperature BK1 want to have to fullfill the actual heat demand

name: TeleSwitch
comment: State of the Teleswitch

name: IsInHoliday
comment: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; holiday function can be started by setting the HC's corresponding bit

name: IsInStorageFilling
comment: burner circuit is locked because of ongoing tank loading

name: CleaningLady
comment: saving function is activated until read value * 1/2 h

name: IsInParty
comment: Every bit of this byte represents a heating circuit; if bit is set the party function is activated for the corresponding HC

name: Hc1PumpPort
comment: State of burner cicuit pump on HK1P

name: OutsideTempCorrection
comment: Correction for outside temperature sensor

name: BoilerMaxPreShutdown
comment: Maximal Boiler preshutdown time

name: HcFlowIncrease
comment: Offset added to flow temperature

name: FrostProtectDelay
comment: Delay time of frost protection

name: EnergyDemandNotReachedDelay
comment: Delay time for not reached temperature

name: EnergyDemandPercentage
comment: Flow temperature's maximum deviation from setpoint for set delay time

name: OtShutdownLimit
comment: For outside temperatures higher than this, there is no heat demand generated anymore

name: FlowTempMin
comment: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will at least be this value

name: TempDesiredLow
comment: Night temperature setpoint of the burner circuit

name: BoilerCircuitDisabled
comment: Disable the burner circuit?

name: OperatingMode
comment: Operating mode of burner circuit

name: FlowTempMax
comment: For a heat demand the desired flow temperature will maximal be this value

name: TempDesired
comment: Day temperature setpoint of the burner circuit

name: HeatingCurve
comment: Heating curve

name: HcMaxPreHeating
comment: maximum time central heating is released in advance of the first time window (time is adjusted according to current outside temperature)

name: TeleswitchOperatingMode
comment: If the tele switch port is activated the burner circuit operates in this mode
